translations: 无扎实基础的；无根据的；无稽的

sentences.sentence: You may feel a bit ungrounded in this new space. It takes time to get used to it.
sentences.translation: 你可能在新空间里觉得有一点无根无据不踏实，你需要花时间去适应。

sentences.sentence: In a collapse scenario - this is a disaster as one will become frightened, ungrounded and unable to function.
sentences.translation: 在崩溃的细节中—这是一场灾难，人类受到惊吓，心烦意乱，无法保持镇定。

sentences.sentence: The view of disaffirmation of the codification of administrative law is ungrounded theoretically and practically.
sentences.translation: 否认行政法的法典化的观点在理论和实践上都是没有依据的。
